name.en: First step to achieving the goals of universities

description.zh: 大學入門是針對大一新生所開授之全校性課程。用以協助學生:(一)認識高等教育的理念、目的與價值(二)有效學習(三)涵養正視困境並妥適因應能力。藉以實踐自我鍛鍊，自我掌握，自我經營並建構宏觀視界的高等教育宗旨。
description.en: "First step to achieving the goals of universities" is a campus-wide course provided for all of the first-year students at this school. The course is designed to help first-year students to achieve the following aims and objectives:(1) understanding the basic idea, goals, and fundamental value of higher education at college level;(2) learning proper study attitudes and methods effectively;(3) cultivating the required abilities and skills of responding appropriately to setbacks and difficult situations in order to acquire self-knowledge, self-control, and self-management, so that they may construct the knowledge and imagination that are needed in planning for grand visions of achieving the goals of higher education.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Nomocracy

description.zh: 本課程以民主、法治課程為核心，重在強化公民的素養，增進政治體制及法律運作實務等之相關課程。
description.en: Democracy and nomocracy are the core curriculum, focusing on enhancing the quality of citizens and promoting the related courses in  the political system, the operation of the law practices and so on.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Nature

description.zh: 本課程主要是培養學生的邏輯思維能力及提升學生對自然領域學科的認識，特別規劃了生命科學概論、邏輯推理與現代科技概論等核心課程，並提供相關進階選修課程，以期同學從課程的學習中，增進學生邏輯思維能力，促進學生珍惜生命、關愛自然環境以及熱愛地球。
description.en: This course including core curricula such as the Introduction of Life Science, Logic Reasoning, and the Introduction of Modern Technology and related advanced elective courses, aims to develop students’ logic thinking and reinforce their knowledge in the field of science. This course is intended to explore students’ logic thinking, and encourage them to cherish life, protect the natural environment, and love the earth.

description.zh: 本課程包含：計算機硬體結構、計算機作業系統、計算機軟體系統、基本程式設計與應用、資料處理、檔案管理、資料庫管理系統、應用套裝軟體、工業管理應用程式實例簡介。
description.en: This course is consists of: computer hardware structure, computer operation systems, computer software systems, basic programming language and applications, data process, file management, database management systems, applied package, and the applications of these Knowledge in IE.

description.zh: 介紹經濟學基本概念及分析方法，包含供給與需求、市場均衡分析、效用與消費者選擇、生產與成本、國民所得與經濟福利、凱因斯所得理論、貨幣理論、綜合供需均衡分析、國際貿易理論。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts of Economics and analytical techniques.  Which includes supply and demand, marketing balance analysis, production and cost, GNP and economic welfare, international trade theories, and so on.

description.zh: 介紹會計學之基本觀念， 會計循環 - 包括分錄、過帳、試算、結算及財務報表之編製。逐一說明財務報表各個項目，最後並介紹財務報表之分析。修畢本課程之後能瞭解會計學之基本原理，會計資料處理及財務報表產生之整個過程，以及簡單之財務報表分析技術，並為未來之企業及財務相關課程打下良好基礎。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts of accounting.  All the necessary processes are included as well the financial report analysis.  After being taking this course, the student can understand the accounting concepts, accounting data process, generation of accounting report and techniques for analyzing the financial report.

name.en: Introduction to Industrial Engineering and Management

description.zh: 主要敘述工業管理的發展、沿革及新趨勢，內容包含：工業組織、人事管理、工廠規畫、成本分析與控制、工業設備、研究發展、生產管理、物料管理、品質管理及工業安全等，期使學生對工業工程與管理整體作業有一概括性的認識。
description.en: This course will mainly introduce the past history, development and future trend of industrial engineering and management. It concludes industrial organization, personnel management, factory planning, cost analysis and control, R&D, production management, materials management, quality management and industrial safety.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 講授工程圖之基本原理及規則，並佐以必要之工程設計知識與AutoCAD 繪圖技巧,培養學生具備熟練與有效率地將設計構想以工程圖方式正確 表達的能力。
description.en: An introductory course providing the student with fundamental information, understanding and skills mainly in orthographic projection. Theories and principles of engineering drawing will be specifically introduced and concurrent with the practice of drafting for industrial design.

description.zh: 包括製作模型所需用之各種機械設備操作、使用工具、紙模型、工業油土等之加工技術。
description.en: Training students to operate some basically equipment such as bench work, sheet metal, machining, and welding machines safely and correctly, giving them the primary skills in model making.

description.zh: 探討家具發展之歷程，主要設計風格之嬗變。內容含蓋起源及影響，構造特色，裝飾方法，設計語彙，家具與其相關環境之意義，以及影響風格表現差異之原因分析等主要課題。
description.en: A survey of major periods and stylistic development of furniture from ancient world to the present. The origins and influences, construction techniques, methods of decoration, the vocabulary and significance of furniture and its related environments, an analysis of the reasons for differences in manner of expression are the major themes discussed in the course.

description.zh: 探討木材之物理及機械性質對於家具構造與製造品質之影響，並讓學生瞭解材料之組織構造以熟識家具用材之鑑定。終其目標在使學生認識材料進而善用材料。 介紹以木質材料為主之家具材料。內容含蓋木材之外觀特徵，組織構造，材料鑑識及其物理與機械性質對於家具構造和製造品質其間之關係等。
description.en: The macrostructure and microstructure of wood. Identification and uses of common Softwoods and Hardwoods. Physical and mechanical properties in relation to wood processing. Properties of other wood based materials such as particleboard, fiberboard, plywood, laminated wood related to their use in furniture manufacture also included.

description.zh: 由對物體寫生的實作過程中，訓練學生對物的觀察能力，並培養對美 的感知能力以及充份習得對形體的簡潔速寫技巧、圖示性設計圖之表 達能力。
description.en: This course introduces a visual approach to thinking, leaning and communicating for design students. Drawing is a tool to help students solve promblems, create new ideas and assist communication. Through practicing drawing methods, tools and techniques, students learn how to draw more proficiently.

description.zh: 研究光的特質，了解攝影的原理，利用攝影的器材、設備、透過攝影的技法，表現攝影的藝術價值，達到攝影創作的目的。
description.en: This course makes students familiar with the nature of light, the principles and the techniques of photography. Through the practice of equipments and tools of photography, the students can learn how to create and express the artistic value of photography.

description.zh: 讓學生習得3D 材質編修電腦軟體之技能，俾能將工業設計產品進行材質模擬與色彩計劃。
description.en: The study of materials edit computer software which could apply materials simulation and color plan on industrial design products.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生與家具實務界交流的平台，邀請家具相關領域的專家進行專題演講，並提供相互研討交流的機會，藉此使同學瞭解家具產業界現況及未來學習的發展方向。
description.en: This course provides students a platform for interacting with current furniture industry, through giving speeches from furniture relative field of industry experts. And provide opportunities for mutual discussions and exchanges. Thereby enabling students to understand the development of the furniture industry's current status and future direction of learning.

description.zh: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through reading materials appropriate to their levels; (2) to develop reading skill by giving explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as analysis of basic writing skill; (3)to  familiarize students with useful expressions in conversation and build up their confidence in cross-cultural communication; (4)to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 國文，是運用本國語言文字，蘊釀於欣賞文藝作品，充實文化內涵，增進思維能力與人文素養的一門課程。本課程分為大一上學期2學分，大一下學期2學分。大一上學期的授課內容，以文學名篇為範圍；希望藉此擴建學生深入品味文學趣味的能力，鍛鍊靈活的語文敏感度，默契文學創意，甚而嘗試創作。大一下學期的授課內容，以思想名篇為範圍；希望藉此啟發學生透轍分析各家學說思想，漫步哲人的宇宙天地，跟隨哲人的心路歷程，進而念茲在茲，從容內化，共饗取之不盡用之不竭的先驗與風範。
description.en: "Chinese" is the course where we make full use of our native languages to enjoy literary works, to enrich our cultural taste, to develop our thinking and even to elevate human cultivation.This four-credit course is set for the freshman students: with 2 credits in each of the two semesters of the school year. In the first semester, the course covers important articles in literature, in the hope for the student learners to cultivate better ability to taste literary works when they have more vivid sense on the language. With fuller knowledge on what literature is about, they are expected to try creative writings. For the second semester, the course is mainly focused on the writings on thoughts. It is our expectation that throughout the reading and analysis of various great schools of philosophy, the student learners are given the opportunity to explore the huge minds of philosophers, who will thus be imitated and followed. Through the internalization, the students might benefit themse

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration.

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.en: First step to achieving the goals of universities

description.zh: 大學入門是針對大一新生所開授之全校性課程。用以協助學生:(一)認識高等教育的理念、目的與價值(二)有效學習(三)涵養正視困境並妥適因應能力。藉以實踐自我鍛鍊，自我掌握，自我經營並建構宏觀視界的高等教育宗旨。
description.en: "First step to achieving the goals of universities" is a campus-wide course provided for all of the first-year students at this school. The course is designed to help first-year students to achieve the following aims and objectives:(1) understanding the basic idea, goals, and fundamental value of higher education at college level;(2) learning proper study attitudes and methods effectively;(3) cultivating the required abilities and skills of responding appropriately to setbacks and difficult situations in order to acquire self-knowledge, self-control, and self-management, so that they may construct the knowledge and imagination that are needed in planning for grand visions of achieving the goals of higher education.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：History

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹計算機系統之基礎觀念以及應用。主要內容包括：1.計算機系統簡介 2 .資料的表示法、數字系統、邏輯3.周邊裝置及儲存體 4. 程式語言與程式設計5. 軟體工程與系統開發工具6.資料結構與演算法 7.作業系統 8.檔案與資料庫 9.資料通訊與計算機網路10.人工智慧 11. 新興技術介紹
description.en: This introductory course covers the fundamentals and applications of computers. The major topics covered in this course are: 1.Introduction to computer systems 2.Data representation, number systems, and logic 3.Peripherals and storage 4. Programming languages and programming 5. Data structures and algorithms 6. Software engineering and system development tools 7. Operating systems 8.File and database systems 9. Data communication and computer networks 10. Artificial intelligence 11. Emerging techniques

description.en: This course introduces the basic data processes of C++ language. They include input/output, program process control, application of functions, program editing and execution, and so on.

description.zh: 本課程主要使學生能強化會計學的基本觀念，並以國際會計原則(IFRS)為架構，熟悉會計流程與財務報表之編製。課程內容包含會計恆等式與財務報表的介紹、借貸法則、會計處理程序(分錄、過帳、試算)與調整、結帳與會計循環的完成、買賣業會計、存貨的會計處理、現金、應收帳款、不動產、廠房與設備、無形資產、負債、股東權益、以及投資活動的會計處理，最後則是現金流量表的編制，與財務報表的運用與分析。
description.en: This course is an introduction to the basic concepts and standards underlying financial accounting systems. Several important concepts will be studied in detail, including: cash, accounts and notes receivable, inventory, marketable securities, equity investments, PPE, intangibles, debt, equity issuance, and dividends. The course emphasizes the construction of the basic financial accounting statements - the income statement, retained earnings statement, statement of financial position, and statement of cash flows - as well as their interpretation. Financial accounting focuses on providing information that is relevant and useful for external users. This course expands your knowledge of understanding of the basic language and conceptions of accounting. The basic accounting concepts that will help you solve problems and exercises designed to transaction recording and financial statement preparation.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Nature

description.zh: 本課程主要是培養學生的邏輯思維能力及提升學生對自然領域學科的認識，特別規劃了生命科學概論、邏輯推理與現代科技概論等核心課程，並提供相關進階選修課程，以期同學從課程的學習中，增進學生邏輯思維能力，促進學生珍惜生命、關愛自然環境以及熱愛地球。
description.en: This course including core curricula such as the Introduction of Life Science, Logic Reasoning, and the Introduction of Modern Technology and related advanced elective courses, aims to develop students’ logic thinking and reinforce their knowledge in the field of science. This course is intended to explore students’ logic thinking, and encourage them to cherish life, protect the natural environment, and love the earth.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：History

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括邏輯閘的特性與功能測試，能利用積體電路完成各種基礎邏輯電路的組裝及設計，並能利用電子儀器進行量測、檢修。探討最佳化組合邏輯之演算法，可規劃邏輯元件，組合邏輯之VLSI設計，使用MSI與標準電路元件設計多層邏輯，使用閘陣列設計，循序邏輯之元件，循序邏輯之分析與合成，VLSI之設計與測試技巧，各種CAD軟體工具介紹。基礎邏輯閘實驗、組合邏輯實驗、加法器及減法器實驗、組合邏輯應用實驗、正反器邏輯實驗、循序邏輯電路應用實驗。
description.en: 1.Properties and function tests of logic gates. 2. Implementations of and designs of basic logic circuits using ICs. 3.Algorithms for the optimization of combinational logic circuits. 4.Programmable logic devices. 5.VLSI design of combinational logic circuits. 6.Multi-layer logic circuits using MSI and standard circuit  elements. 7.Gate array design. 8.Sequential Logic components. 9.Analysis and synthesis of sequential Logic circuits. 10. Technologies of VLSI design and test. 11. CAD software tools. 12.Basic logic gate experiments. 13.Combinational logic experiments. 14. Adder and subtractor experiments. 15. Combinational logic application experiments. 16. Flip-flop experiments. 17. Sequential circuit application experiments.

description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

description.zh: 瞭解工程系統中常用數學之原理及應用，內容包含：1.常微分一階、二階及高階方程式之解法，2.拉普拉斯 (Laplace)變換及其在電路上之應用，3.向量分析及其在電磁學上之應用。

description.zh: 1. 瞭解電路元件之基本特性及其組合電路之分析方法，內容包含：(1)電路元件：電壓及電流源，主動元件，(2)電路特性：歐姆定律，柯希荷夫電壓與電流定律等，(3)一階及二階電路：電路之微分方程描述及各種輸入信號之響應，(4)穩態分析與頻率響應：分析電路之頻域，(5)電腦輔助電路分析：如使用 SPICE 工具。2. 瞭解線性與非線性電路的組成與分析法，內容包含：(1)交流激勵電路：交流穩態分析，功率計算及相電路，(2)三相電路：Ｙ與△型轉換及功率分析，(3)變壓器電路：互感應及電壓電流的變換，(4)頻率響應分析：極點與零點，轉移函數，(5)Fourier 級數，轉換及應用，(6)Laplace轉換及應用。
description.en: The course covers the synthesis and analysis of bath linear and nonlinear circuits.Contents include:1.Introduction to linear circuit analysis, 2. Resistive circuit, 3. Kirchhoff laws, 4. Thevenin and Norton theorem, 5. First and second order circuit, 6. Node and loop analysis, 7. Steady state response and analysis, 8. SPICE tool, 9.AC circuit :AC steady-state analysis, phasor analysis, 10. Three phase circuits, 11. Transformer circuits, 12. Frequency response, 13. Fourier series, Fourier transformation and application, 14. Laplace transformation and application.

description.en: (1)The characteristic curve of PN diode; (2)The applications of PN diode : Rectifier, Filter, Clipper, Clamper, and Voltage-doubler; (3)Light Emitting Diode drivers; (4)Zener diode for voltage regulation; (5)The identification of BJT's leads and the measurement of b parameter; (6)The input and output characteristic curves of BJTs; (7)DC biasing circuits for BJTs; (8)Common-Emitter(CE) amplifiers; (9)Emitter-follower(EF) circuits; (10)Common-Base(CB) constant current sources; (11)The identification of FET's leads and the measurement of device parameters; (12)The transfer and output characteristic curves of FETs; (13)DC biasing circuits for FETs; (14)The amplifying circuits of FETs; (15)Retifier circuit and Filter; (16)Bias analysis and design; (17)Common Emitter amplifier, Common base amplifier, Common collector amplifier; (18)Differential amplifier.

description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

SPICE tool, 9.AC circuit :AC steady-state analysis, phasor analysis, 10. Three phase circuits, 11. Transformer circuits, 12. Frequency response, 13. Fourier series, Fourier transformation and application, 14. Laplace transformation and application.

description.zh: 介紹電子零組件之組成，特性以及其應用，使學生具有實用電路之分析模擬與設計應用之能力，內容涵蓋：1.半導体物理，2.基本主動元件(二極体，雙極性電晶体，場效電晶体)，3.放大器電路，4.邏輯(數位)電路，5.積体電路。
description.en: 1.Semiconductor physics 2.Diode 3.Bipolar Junction transistor 4.Field-efferct 5.Operatonal amplifier 6.Digital logic circuit 7.Integrated circuit

description.zh: (1)半導體二極體特性曲線; (2)半導體二極體之應用:整流器,濾波器,剪波器,箝位器,倍壓器; (3)發光二極體驅動電路; (4)齊納二極體穩壓電路; (5)雙極接合面電晶體之辨別與參數量測; (6)雙極接合面電晶體輸入及輸出特性曲線; (7)雙極接合面電晶體直流偏壓電路; (8)共射極放大電路; (9)射極隨耦電路; (10)共基極定電流源電路; (11)場效電晶體之辨別與參數量測; (12)場效電晶體轉移及輸出特性曲線; (13)場效電晶體直流偏壓電路; (14)場效電晶體放大電路; (15)整流及濾波電路; (16)偏壓分析與設計; (17)基本放大器(共射，共基，共集模式，共源，共汲，共閘等); (18)串級放大器; (19)差動放大器。

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.en: This course introduces the concepts, theories, and approaches of facilities planning.  Material handling and site selection are also included.

description.zh: 本研究討論課程之目的在使研究生學習控制工程、通訊工程、計算機工程之最新科技。受邀演講之著名專家學者透過廣泛的討論分享其研究結果與經驗，選修此課程之研究生亦須就其研究主題進行正式報告。
description.en: The seminar course is designed for graduate students to learn the latest technologies in the areas of control, communications and computer engineering. Renowned researchers and scholoars are invited to share their research results and experience through extensive discussion. Furthermore, all students in this course are required to make formal presentations on their specialized topics.

description.zh: 認識通俗科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。 本課程授課包括約三分之一的時間在語言教室練習職場英語。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings. The coursed is also devised to include about one third of total teaching hours to practice English, particularly used in office or work, in the language laboratory.

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 以案例解析為主的方式，探究我國著作權法的重要課題，藉以協助同學了解審判實務適用法律的依據、判準或論證等，並適時補充國外相關學理、判決及著名案例等，以增進同學對國內外相關重要著作權案例之思辨及評析的能力。
description.en: This is a course focused on case analyses, in studying important issues relating to Taiwanese Copyright Act. Graduate students joining this course may find help on comprehension of the basis, rules or argumentation to the laws applied in trial practice.  Together with timely supplementation of relevant foreign academic interpretations, adjudications and noted cases, students may improve their ability of contemplation and analysis on related and significant copyright cases home and abroad.

description.zh: 本課程旨在對非工程類科出身之研究生，做有系統基礎材料科學之建立。課程包括(1)原子鍵結與配位(2)晶體[原子規律性](3)固相中之不規律性(4)相平衡(5)材料微結構(6)反應速率(7)材料破壞學(8)導電材與半導材料(9)陶瓷材料(10)聚合物及複合材料
description.en: This course is aimed at systematically introducing some important concepts of material engineering for students who were not an engineer training in their BS. The course covers (1)Atomic Bonding and Coordination (2)Crystal Structure (3)Disorder in Solid Phase (4)Phase Equilibria (5)Microstructures (6)Reaction Rate (7)Deformation and Fracture (8)Conducting and Semi-conducting Materials (9)Ceramic Materials (10)Polymer and Composites.

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在教授學生物聯網的基本技術，以及創新思考的方法，使學生能夠創造物聯網方面的創新應用。課程內容包括: 物聯網概論、嵌入式系統介紹、創新精神、創新思考、雲端服務、大數據介紹、感測器實作、物聯網系統實作以及創新專題製作。
description.en: This course is to instruct students the basics of internet of things and design thinking methodology to enable students to develop innovative applications of internet of things. The contents include introduction to internet of things, embedded systems, innovation mindset, design thinking, cloud systems, bid data introduction, practices on embedded systems, practices on internet of things, and innovation project implementation.

description.zh: (A) 部分：1.基本CMOS邏輯閘設計，2.CMOS基本邏輯閘時序模擬，3.CMOS基本邏輯閘佈局，4.數位電路功能分析與模擬，5.階層式的電路組成，6.中小型電路設計，7.VHDL系統，(B) 部分：1.認識Cadence系統， 2.圖形編輯設備的操作練習，3.零件庫介紹，4.設計電路之輸入編輯，5.電路模擬實習，6.數位電路的晶片設計，7.晶片製造專題。
description.en: (A)1.Basic CMOS logic design2.CMOS logic gate simulation 3.CMOS logic gate placement4.Analysis and simulation of digital circuit 5.Hierachy circuit6.VHDL system(B)1.Introduction to c cadence system2.Graphic editor practice3.module4.Input editor 5.Circuit simulation practice6.Special projects

description.zh: 1.光纖概論，2.光纖波導，3.光纖傳輸特特性，4.光纖與光纜，5.光纖連接，6.光源與檢光器，7.光纖系統，8.光纖量測，9.光纖應用與未來發展。
description.en: 1.Introduction 2.Waveguide of optical fibers3.Propagation in optical fibers4.Optical fibers and opotical cable5.Fiber connectors6.Light sources and detectors7.Optical fiber communication systems8.Measurement of optical fiber communication systems9.Applications

description.zh: 本課程探討現代通訊的基本原理，內容重點放在類比通訊的調變技巧與雜訊分析．課程大綱包括：1.簡介2.信號與系統3.機率、隨機程序與雜訊4.振幅調變：雙旁波帶、調幅、單旁波帶與殘旁波帶5.角度調變：頻率調變與相位調變6.脈波調變：脈幅調變、脈寬調變、脈位調變、脈碼調變與步差調變7.數位通訊簡介對於數位通訊有進一步興趣的同學可繼續選修『數位通訊系統』課程
description.en: Fundamental principles of modern communication will be investigated in depth in this course, with emphasis on analog communications.Basic modulation techniques will be introduced with nosie analysis.Contents include1.Introduction 2.Signals and Systems3.Probability ,Random Process,and Nosie4.Amplitude Modulations:DSB,AM,SSB,and VSB5.Angle Modulations:FMand PM6.Pulse Modulations:PAM,PWM,PPM,PCM,and DM7.Intorduction to Digital Communication Students who want to know more details sbout digital commmunication are encouraged to take the course Digital Communication Systems

description.zh: 1.積體電路的分類，2.積體電路晶片設計的流程，3.CMOS元件的基本結構與佈局，4.CMOS元件的設計規範技術，5.CMOS元件組成各種數位電路，6.以高階方法探討積體電路之設計，7.系統分割，8.設計問題之探討，9.IC的構造， 10.設計方法，11.時序問題之探討，12.鐘脈問題之探討，13.VLSI之測試，14.有助於設計與測試的結構化技巧探討，15.專題製作。
description.en: 1.Classification of VLSI circuit 2.Flow of VLSI design 3.VLSI characterization 4.CMOS design methods5.CMOS digital circuit 6.High-level VLSI design7.System partiton 8.Time squence9.Clock10.VLSI testing 11.Special projects

description.zh: 1.簡介，2.個人電腦（PC-486）之界面，3. 視窗作業系統，Visual Basic 及Borland C++ 3.1 語言，4.視窗應用界面(API)，動態脫結程式庫 (DLL)，動態資料交換 (DDE) 及物件連結崁入(OLE) 基本程式設計，5.客戶應用程式及服務者應用程式的架構設計，6.多媒體，影像壓縮和運動，7.簡介人工智慧，專家系統，Fuzzy 及 Neural 網路，8.圖形監控系統：A. IODDE, B. NETDDE, C. 物件導向圖控, D. 分散式控制網路，9.論文研討。
description.en: 1.introduction to personal computer interface.2.Windows operation system : V.B.or VC++.3.Program design for Dynamic link library (DLL).4.Program design for Dynamic Data exchange (DEE).5.Device Driver writing for windows :I.O.DDEand NETDDE.6.Multi-media and Virtual Reality Internet.7.Introduction to A.I.and Fuzzy-Neural Network .8.Object-Qriented graphic control user interface.

description.en: This course is concerned with the analog integrated circuit design. Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of analog CMOS integrated circuits, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1.Introduction o analog design2.Basic MOS device physics3.Single-stage amplifiers4.Differential amplifiers5.Frequency response6.Noise7.Feedback8.Operational amplifiers9.Oscillators10.Phase-locked loops

description.en: This course is introduced the principle of Radio Frequency IC Design such that the students have the ability of Radio Frequency IC design. The contents of this course are1、CHARACTERISITICS OF PASSIVE IC COMPONENTS2、A REVIEW OF MOS DEVICE PHYSICS3、PASSIVE RLC NETWORKS4、DISTRIBUTED SYSTEMS5、THE SMITH CHART AND S-PARAMETERS6、BANDWIDTH ESTIMATION TECHNIQUES7、HIGH-FREQUENCY AMPLIFIER DESIG8、VOLTAGE REFERENCES AND BIASING9、NOISE ANALYSIS10、LNA DESIGN11、MIXERS12、RF POWER AMPLIFIERS13、FEEDBACK SYSTEMS14、PHASE-LOCKED LOOPS15、OSCILLATORS AND SYNTHESIZERS16、ARCHITECTURES

description.zh: 本課程主要目標在研習以VLSI的觀點來設計近代數位訊號處理架構，使學生得以將數位訊號處理的架構以超大型積體電路IC方式來實現之。其課程內容包含如下：1、超大型積體電路介紹2、各式數位訊號架構介紹3、各式加減乘除法器架構4、DCT、FIR、MPEG等架構5、近代高效率數位訊號等架構6、專題研究
description.en: This course is an introduction to the design and implementation of various types of VLSI DSP structures and such that the students have the ability of DSP IC design in this course. The major topics covered in this course are:1、Introduction to modern VLSI system2、Introduction to digital signal processing system3、Architectures of adder、subtracter、multiplier、divider etc.4、Architectures of DCT、FIR and MPEG etc.5、Modern high-performance DSP architecture6、Special project

description.zh: 本課程主要係介紹資料壓縮的原理以及當前幾項重要的壓縮標準。本課程內容將涵蓋以下主題01. 霍夫曼編碼02. 算數編碼03. 純量量化與向量量化04. 線性預測與預測編碼法（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. 轉換編碼（KLT，DFT，DCT，DST以及Walsh-Hadamard轉換）06. 分頻編碼法（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. 小波編碼法（SPIHT，JPEG2000）08. 字典模式編碼法09. 跑長編碼法10. 主題探討
description.en: This course is mainly focused on the principles of data compression techniques as well as the state-of-the-art compression standards. The course content includes01. Huffman codes02. Arithmetic codes03. Scalar quantization and Vector quantization04. Linear prediction and Predictive coding（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. Transform coding（KLT, DFT, DCT, DST, and WHT）06. Subband coding（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. Wavelet-Based Compression（SPIHT, JPEG2000）08. Dictionary techniques09. Runlength coding10. Selected topics

name.en: Clinical Application of Medical Electronic Device

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為使學生以電子學的知識，應用在生物醫學的臨床領域。本課程將介紹生理測量的應用電路，由電路的實現使學生更能感受到生醫電子的實際應用範疇。包含生醫感測器、生醫電子放大器、血壓和心血管診斷儀器。本課程主要著重在觀念的溝通與臨床之應用，使學生能學習與扮演電子工程與臨床醫學之橋樑角色。
description.en: This course aims to provide students with electronics knowledge, to help the clinical application in the biomedical field. This course will introduce the medical electronic systems and electronic circuit theory, and then introduce the application of physiological measurement circuit. Mainly on medical equipment and application of technical principles, which includes  biomedical sensors, electrodes and transducers, biomedical electronic amplifier, blood pressure and cardiovascular diagnostic equipment. The students can learn and play a role of bridge between electrical engineering and clinical medicine.

description.zh: 一、	從廣域範圍介紹自然生態與人文資源永續發展之道二、	藉由我國現階段環境發展策略及個案經驗，實務討論生態環境課題與措施。三、	課程內容涵蓋台灣自然與生態環境現況、森林、山坡地、農地、能源、海洋、自然保育、人文環境保育、環境法規、環境影響評估。
description.en: 1.	It will introduce the sustainable development of natural ecology and human resources through wide range.2.	It will emphasize with students to discuss the issues and strategies on environmental ecology. Those discussions will depend on national environmental development policies and special cases in recent years.3.	This course will include Taiwan nature and ecology, forest, lands lope , farmland, coastal area, natural conservation , human resources ,environmental impact assessment.

name.en: The earthquake-proof performance principle and the character

description.zh: 本課程將介紹現今用各種結構系統〔耐震、免震（隔震）、制震（減震）〕的特性及耐震性能原理，由基礎力學理論配合應用實務設計做一統括整理解說。並從地震中建築物實際破壞狀況的解說到耐震診斷及耐震補強技術做一現況的解說與說明。
description.en: The earthquake-proof performance principle and the characteristic of the structural system (1.General structure 2.Base isolation structure 3.Virbration control,Damper) being used well now are introduced at this course, and lectures from the mechanics theory of the base to a aactual design. In addition, the destruction situation and the earthquake-proof diagnosis reinforcement in the building are explained due to the earquake.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是研究人與環境互動的關係，介紹環境心理學發展的過程及相關的理論。並藉由觀察與評估現有生活環境中的行為，增進我們對環境心理學中在理論與經驗上不同取向的瞭解。課程內容包括1.緒論2.研究方法及理論架構 3. 建成環境，由家環境到城市空間4.社會行為及實質環境5.自然環境與行為6.使用者用後評估7. 結論
description.en: The purpose of this course is to explore the interaction relationships between human and environment, introducing the development and theory of environmental psychology. Via observing and evaluating the behavior of present living environment, enhance our knowledge about environmental psychology through various approaches to theories and experiences. The course includes:1. Introduction  2. Research methods and theory framework 3. The built environment from home environment to city space 4. Social behavior and the physical environment 5. The natural environment and behavior 6. Post-occupancy evaluation 7. Conclusion

description.zh: 1.電化學機構─似乾電池，法拉第定律2.腐蝕驅勢和電極電位─Nernst方程式，電位─pH圖3.極化和腐蝕速率─Evans圖4.鈍態理論─氧化膜理論和吸附理論5.防蝕法─陰、陽極防蝕法和抑制劑、鈍態劑防蝕6.八大類濕式腐蝕形態7.高溫腐蝕
description.en: Course Outline：1.Electrochemical Mechanisms─dry cell analogy and Faraday's law2.Corrosion Tendency and Electrode Potentials─Nernst equation, Pourbaix diagrams3.Polarization and Corrosion Rates─Evans diagrams4.Theories of Passivity─oxide film theory and adsorption theory of passivity5.Corrosion Prevention─cathodic and anodic protections, inhibitors, passivators6.Eight forms of Corrosion7.High Temperature Corrosion

name.zh: 專利程序審查與新型專利
name.en: Patent application procedures and utility model patent

description.zh: 本課程將介紹申請專利的相關規定，以及辦理其他有關專利事項，例如：申請分割、申請改請、專利權讓與、提起舉發等等，必須符合之程序要件；另外也將介紹台灣之新型專利相關之申請與審查作業。
description.en: In this course, we will focus on the practices of the patent application procedures and related regulations. In addition, utility model patent system in Taiwan is also presented.

name.en: Interactive Installation and Performing Arts Technology

description.zh: 本課程介紹整合即時影像、即時音訊、實體裝置、及相關表演科技（如燈光控制、各類感應器應用等）之技術與應用實務，並藉由圖形化、物件導向程式設計系統，引導未有程式設計經驗的視覺設計者或輔助已有程式設計能力者，以更有效率的方式進行相關互動系統設計，藉以達成互動裝置、表演科技、與表演藝術之整合。
description.en: This course introduces the technology that help integrates real-time video, audio, installations, and associated performance arts technology (such as lighting control, the application of various types of sensors, etc.) into performing arts. Through a graphical, object-oriented programming system, the course is intended to help visual designers with no programming experiences or to assist experienced programmers to efficiently design the interactive systems that combine interactive installations, performance arts technology, and performing arts itself as a whole.

notes: 日職合開/使用進修部教室/選課上限為30人

description.zh: 本課程讓學生了解車輛省油不單純只是引擎燃燒性能或機構的改良而已，且另一個對車輛省油有重要貢獻的手段便是車輛的傳動系統技術的改良，此先進改良的方式增加學生對傳動系統重要性的認識。
description.en: This course introduces the concept of power train system, the relationship between engine and power train system, and the mechanical design of power train system. The purpose of this study is to increase the students' understanding in power train system.

description.zh: 最佳化組合邏輯之演算法，可規劃邏輯元件，組合邏輯之VLSI設計，使用MSI與標準電路元件設計多層邏輯，使用閘陣列設計，循序邏輯之元件，循序邏輯之分析與合成，VLSI之設計與測試技巧，各種CALD軟體工具介紹。

description.zh: 本課程之教學目標在使學生瞭解信號與系統之基本概念及分析方法，以作為控制，通訊，電子電路，濾波器設計及數位信號處理等課程修習之基礎。課程內容包含：(1)標準訊號及訊號表示法 (2)連續系統的數學分析 (3)離散系統的數學分析 (4)拉氏轉換分析 (5)Z-轉換分析 (6)傅立葉分析 (7)工程應用。

description.zh: 瞭解程式語言所常用之各種資結構，１.抽象資料類別及運算複雜度之概念，２.靜態結構及其儲存法，３.遞迴、堆疊、前序、中序、後序運算式，４.佇列，５.串列、鏈結串列，６.樹、二元樹、平衡樹、堆積，７.圖形，８.排序，９.搜尋、雜湊。
description.en: This course is mainly aimed at introducing the data  structures commonly used in programming languages, including: (1) the concept of ADT (abstract data type) and computational complexity, (2) static structures and their storage representations , (3) recursion, stacks, and prefix, infix, and posfix expressions, (4) queues, (5) lists and linked lists, (6) trees, binary trees, height balanced trees, and heaps,  (7) graphs, (8) soring, and (9) searching and hashing.

name.zh: 結構物檢測評估及補強

description.zh: 1.結構物劣化形態，介紹.2.目視檢測與非破性檢測。3.現況評估與分析。4.維修與補強設計。
description.en: 1.Reterioration types of concrete structures. 2.Visual an Non-estructive inspection. 3.Conition Evaluation and Analysis. 4.Maintenance and Repair Design.

description.zh: 知識管理是二十一世紀知識與學習型企業發展知識經濟最主要的技能，而營建與土木工程是一個需要專業知識的技術型產業，故亦應融入知識管理之理念。本課程基於上述理念，分別介紹營建興土木工程之相關專業技能，知識管理與企業e化發展技術，進而探討營建導入知識管理之技巧與方法。
description.en: Knowledge Management(KM) is the most important technique of learning type business for developing knowledge economy in the 21st century.Construction and civil engineering need to conduct knowledge management due to they are complex and full with professional techniques.This course will introduce related professional techniques of construction and civil engineering,the development technology of knowledge management and a e business,also will illustrate the conducting methods of construction knowledge management.

description.zh: 實驗是進行科學與工程研究不可或缺的工具，實驗方法的設計與實驗數據的分析更是決定實驗結果品質優劣的關鍵，本課程將介紹實驗過程所必須具備的各項知識，以數據的量測與分析為開始，並介紹量測各類物理量的感測元件，如壓力、溫度、流量及聲波等，以建立學生具備實驗量測的基礎。課程主要內容包含有基本量測、量測標準、量測單位、訊號讀取、資料簡報、數據的準確性與變異性、類比訊號量測、數位訊號量測、系統響應、感測器。
description.en: Introduction of Experiment and Measurement MethodExperiment is the essential tool for the research of science and engineering. The design of experiment and the analysis of data are the keys of the high quality of experiment. The course will introduce the materials of experiment and measurement. The procedures of measurement and the analysis method of data will be detailed investigated. And then the sensors to measure the interested physical parameters of pressure, temperature, flow rate and acoustic will be introduced. The technology of measurement and analysis of experiment will be built up in the course. The contents of the course are basic measurement, standards of measurement, dimension of measurement, access data, data presentation, accuracy and uncertainty of data, analog signal measurement, digital signal measurement, system response, and sensors.

description.zh: 現代能源工程技術，決定製程成本，故如何統合有效率的能源管理技術是決定產品競爭力之關鍵，本課程主要內容為︰1. 能源成本控制2. 區域型電力能管理策略3. 能源系統的經濟性設計概念4. 冷暖系統的檢測與分析5. 總合能源操作的工程化資料收集6. 新能源系統的生態模組化設計
description.en: At the completion of this course, students will be able to several factors:1. Compare and contrast the various forms of energy conversion.2. Examine the technologies used to convert chemical energy into mechanical energy.3. Apply the concepts of electrical converters.4. Evaluate the major types of energy storage.5. Determine how human values affect the success of energy conservation.6. Design of new energy system modules with ecology considerations.

description.zh: 本課程介紹系統工程，系統工程專注於處理大型、複雜的專案發展時，所面臨的相關工程發展程序與問題，如何從計畫任務成型、系統設計、實體產出、整合測試、品質保證、系統操作、後勤支援、任務操作與結束等全程的一門跨多學科領域的管理與工程科學。本課程簡介系統工程重要議題，並以典型衛星系統研發作為本課程之應用範例。課程內容包括: 系統基本概念、系統工程基本概念、任務分析、系統需求、功能分析與配置、設計整合、產品獲取(或發展)與系統驗證、品質保證、系統管控、系統工程的實施、衛星系統工程實務。
description.en: The course will introduce systems engineering. Systems engineering normally emphasizes handling the engineering process and problems in the development of large and complicated projects/programs. It involves how the project/ program mission formed, system design, hardware/software components produced, integration and testing, quality assurance, system operations, logistics, mission operations until its decommission. It involves various interdisciplinary sciences and management skill for the engineering knowledge and skill to meet the needs for mission success.  This course will provide the introduction on the systems engineering and provide the typical satellites (mission) systems research and development as the examples for better understanding its wide applications. The courses may cover: fundamental concept of system and systems engineering, mission analysis, system requirements, functional analysis and allocations, design and integration, products procurement/ development and syste

name.en: Principles and Practices of  Cloud Computing

description.zh: 課程介紹雲端資訊計算與運用相關技術，使學生對雲端平台、架構、服務有全面性瞭解。課程內容包括： 1.雲端運算發展近況及基本概念2.資源虛擬化之基本概念與技術，3.雲端運算相關技術、效能與安全，4.虛擬化資料中心建置-虛擬計算、儲存、網路與應用，6.雲端服務規劃，7.雲端之基礎設施服務、平台服務、軟體服務介紹，8.專題討論。
description.en: Cloud Computing, either private, public or hybrid, is dramatically transforming every aspect of IT. Now it has become ubiquitous these days, and is the key foundation for developing technologies of Big Data and Internet of Things (IoT). Its deployment starts delivering applications with more benefits than the existing legacy infrastructure.Because the terms are broadly quoted and adopted, then by this course, the Cloud Computing core technologies and the associated below will be well introduced:1.Cloud Computing Basic Concept 2.Resources Virtualization & Software Defined Data Center (SDDC)3.Cloud Computing Security 4.Cloud Technologies5.Cloud Service Planning and Deployment 6.Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS)7.Platform as a Service (PaaS)8.Software as a Services (SaaS)9.Cloud Service Operations 10.Case Studies and presentation
